title: Understanding Thermal Stability
text: Thermal stability refers to a material's ability to maintain its properties at elevated temperatures. Consider what type of analysis would help determine this property.

title: Types of Analysis
text: There are several types of analysis in chemistry: qualitative, quantitative, characterization, and fundamental. Which one focuses on understanding the properties and behavior of materials?

title: Choosing the Right Analysis
text: Which analysis type examines thermal stability of a material?
